name: nihil vīvit
description:
nihil vīvit, nihil spīrat.

mundus est cadāver, mālum putridum, mustēlla mortua.

(nothing lives, nothing breathes. the world is a corpse, a rotting apple, a dead stoat.)

controls:

a/left - move left

d/right - move right

w/up/spacebar - jump

left mouse - dig/place block

1234567890/scroll wheel - change hotbar slot

f11 - toggle fullscreen

s - save game (autosaves also exist, but just to be sure) ((also saving the player's position is a bit jank but whatever))

escape - quit game

made for the secret santa jam 2021, for ono.

all sounds from freesound.org under cc0. everything else by 89o.
